Volunteer

Volunteering supports project review, maintenance, and new development for open legal-aid systems.

If you have previously submitted a project that passed verification, you are encouraged to apply as a volunteer contributor.

Volunteer roles may include security review, interoperability testing, documentation, and feature development.
